articles.description: To find the the best custom bookshelf makers in New York City, we polled dozens of stylish and savvy New Yorkers. Here, built-in bookshelves for any room.
articles.content:
Stephen Carr, stephen@treenail.com; 201-681-4128
Working from a converted barn in Walnutport, Pennsylvania, woodworker Stephen Carr mostly makes custom furniture for longtime clients like architect-… [+970 chars]
